text: Champlin is a city in the U.S. state of Minnesota. Charles Miles created the first permanent settlement that was called called the Marshall Township which was split into six town's Champlin and Dayton in 1859. The town's name Champlin came from the family name of U.S. Navy Commodore Stephen Champlin. == References == == Other websites == * City of Champlin - Official city website. Category:Cities in Minnesota
title: Champlin, Minnesota
